flawed_nl_solution:
After the first spray kills 50% of germs, there will be 100 - 50 = <<100-50=50>>50% left.
The second spray kills 25%, but 5% have already been killed by the 50% spray, so it kills 25 - 5 = <<25-5=21>>21%.
After the second spray kills 21% of the remaining germs, there will be 50 - 21 = <<50-21=29>>29% left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
